### Digest London crime data and create a visual by neighbourhood
FileNames <- list.files(path = "../data/LondonCrime",recursive = T, full.names = T)

df <- FileNames %>% map_dfr(read.csv)

df_large <- df
names(df)

df <- df_large %>%
  select(Longitude,Latitude,Crime.type)
